item.title: Serverless: AWS HTTP Gateway - 502 Bad Gateway
item.description: service: http-gateway frameworkVersion: ">=1.2.0 <2.0.0" provider: name: aws runtime: python3.6 timeout: 180 functions: no-op: name: NoOp handler: handler.noop events: - http: POST noOp def noop(event, context): return "hello" $ serverless deploy Serverless: Packaging service... Serverless: Excluding development dependencies... Serverless: Uploading CloudFormation file to S3... Serverless: Uploading artifacts... Serverless: Uploading service .zip file to S3 (179 B)... Serverless: Validating template... Serverless: Updating Stack... Serverless: Checking Stack update progress... .............. Serverless: Stack update finished.
